entity.description: Complete Software Development Life Cycle for DOTS Family Mode including phases, gates, and workflows based on existing codebase patterns

requirements.description: Requirements gathering using Engram context entities, technical analysis with explore/librarian agents, architecture decisions documented as ADRs, and task decomposition with dependencies
requirements.title: Phase 1: Planning & Analysis

requirements.description: Component design following existing patterns (async/tokio, DBus interfaces, error handling), security analysis with threat modeling, database schema design with migrations, and API design with comprehensive documentation
requirements.title: Phase 2: Design & Architecture

requirements.description: Code implementation following Rust standards, test-driven development with unit/integration tests, continuous integration via GitHub Actions, and commit validation with Engram task references
requirements.title: Phase 3: Implementation

entity.title: SDLC Process Framework
